v0/rust/servers/{server_id}/events/start.description: Channel for the API to process for when a server has started

publish.description: You can consume this event to learn when the server was started

v0/rust/servers/{server_id}/events/stopp.description: Channel for the API to process for when a server has stopped

publish.description: You can consume this event to learn when the server was stopped

v0/rust/servers/{server_id}/events/playe.description: Event for when a player used the chat

steam_id.description: The steam ID of a player

publish.description: You can consume this event to learn when a player used the in-game chat

steam_id.description: The player's steamID64, must be 17 chars long.

raw_message.description: The raw message before being converted with title and rank
